price: 6. Badanaa intaan Nabi u dirnay kuwii hore dhexdood!
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن نَّبِيّٖ فِي ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakam arsalnā min nabiyyin fī al-awalīna
